ch.aplu.raspisim

Class TurtleRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.raspisim.Robot
      • ch.aplu.raspisim.TurtleRobot

  • public class TurtleRobot
extends Robot
    Implementation of the basic Logo turtle movements.

      • forward

        public void forward()
        Starts moving forward and returns immediately.

      • forward

        public void forward(int steps)
        Moves the turtle forward the given number of steps. The methods blocks until the turtle is at the final position (or the game grid window is disposed).
        Parameters:
        steps - the number of steps to go.

      • backward

        public void backward(int steps)
        Moves the turtle backward the given number of steps. The methods blocks until the turtle is at the final position (or the game grid window is disposed).
        Parameters:
        steps - the number of steps to go.

      • backward

        public void backward()
        Starts moving backward and returns immediately.

      • right

        public void right(double angle)
        Turns the turtle to the right for the given angle. The methods blocks until the turtle is at the final position (or the game grid window is disposed).
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in degree to rotate.

      • right

        public void right()
        Starts turning right and returns immediately.

      • left

        public void left(double angle)
        Turns the left to the right for the given angle. The methods blocks until the turtle is at the final position (or the game grid window is disposed).
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in degree to rotate.

      • left

        public void left()
        Starts turning left and returns immediately.
